title: Angular Service with Spectator spec Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the service?

path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

isDataService.description: When true, generate specs for data service

jest.description: When true, uses Jest to create mocks.
